feature.name: TM9 8x2 Octal Antenna Downlink Performance Package
feature.summary: The TM9 8x2 Octal Antenna Downlink Performance Package feature provides increased

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.csiRsConfigType8TxTDD
parameters.description: If EUtranCellTDD.csiRsConfigType8TxTDD is                                 configured as NZP_CSIRS or                                     NZP_ZP_CSIRS, CSI-RS collides with                                 UE-specific reference signal on port 5 and the throughput of TM7                                 decreses.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.transmissionMode
parameters.description: When the EUtranCellTDD.transmissionMode parameter                                 is set to 9, the transmission mode is TM9.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_UE_MEASUREMENT
parameters.description: Samples with RANK=1 and TX=9 used toward a UE. Only PCell is                                     included.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_UE_MEASUREMENT
parameters.description: Samples with RANK=2 and TX=9 used toward a UE. Only PCell is                                     included.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_UE_MEASUREMENT
events.description: Samples with RANK=1 and TX=9 used toward a UE. Only PCell is                                     included.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_UE_MEASUREMENT
events.description: Samples with RANK=2 and TX=9 used toward a UE. Only PCell is                                     included.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011840 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011840 MO instance.
